noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Labrador, a coastal region of eastern Canada; specifically a member of any of several Inuit peoples native to this region.

adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characteristic of Labrador or its inhabitants.
In form Labradorean. Designating or relating to an ice sheet which covered parts of north-eastern North America during the Pleistocene epoch.

origin: Early 19th century. From the name of Labrador + -ian.
